price: Uw’umutima winangiye, hejuru y’ibyo akaba ari ikinyendaro (atazwi inkomoko ye kwa se).[1]
footnotes: [1] -Umuntu uvugwa muri iyi mirongo ni uwitwa Al Walid ibun al Mughirat, umwe mu babangikanyamana b’i Maka warwanyaga Intumwa y’Imana Muhamadi.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
